name: BEATS on BASE
description: Beats on Base is a vibrant and community-driven meme coin project, centering around Beats the Koala, an AI-powered character who injects charm and innovation into the crypto scene. The project uniquely combines engaging, fun music videos and dynamic user-generated AI content, providing a platform for creativity and interaction. Through a set of accessible and interactive tools, community members are invited to participate in building a lively and playful brand.
